# ABS List

This is the list of journals listed as ABS4\*, ABS4, ABS3 or ABS2.

**Updated in: "`r Sys.Date()`"**

## ABS4

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning= FALSE}
library(readxl)
smart <- read_excel("files/smartacademy/Smart_Academy_2021_4star.xlsx")
knitr::kable(head(smart[, 1:4],1000))
```
